channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "I believe Artificer Infusions are wrong" - Repeating shot and Radiant weapon levels are switched

item.title: Re: I believe Artificer Infusions are wrong
item.content:encoded: Checked a couple different sources, this seems to be the case. Made the fix.

item.title: I believe Artificer Infusions are wrong
item.content:encoded:
Repeating Shot is labeled as a 6th level infusion when it isn't
Radiant Weapon is not labeled as a 6th level infusion when it actually is.

It actually might be the descriptions too. Since it says radiant weapon requires the ammunition property.
